Course Description: THIS COURSE IS AN IN-DEPTH EXAMINATION OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING AND REPORTING.  SPECIFIC TOPICS INCLUDE THE ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRESENTATION OF CASH, RECEIVABLES, INVENTORIES, PROPERTY, PLANT, AND EQUIPMANT AND INTANGIBLE ASSETS.  THE CONCEPTUAL FRAMEWORK OF ACCOUNTING AND THE TIME VALUE OF MONEY ARE ALSO EXAMINED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
